description: Try our easy to follow Cod With Lemon, Basil & Sun-dried Tomato Crust recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Cod With Lemon, Basil & Sundried Tomato Crust Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 thick cod fillets, about 150 g each
3 tbs olive oil, save 1 tbs for oiling

recipeInstructions.text: Season the cod, then place on a lightly oiled baking sheet. Rub 1 tablespoon of the oil over the top of the fish.

Mix together all the remaining ingredients. Press on top of each fish fillet, then drizzle over the remaining oil. Place in a preheated oven, 200°C for 1215 minutes until the fish is lightly crisp and cooked through. Serve with potatoes and a tomato salad.
